title: 'Trying to Reconnect' after every game.
body:
Title basically explains the issue. After every game I get the "Trying to Reconnect" dialog, followed by the 'waiting for stats' dialog which will then last until eternity. 

It's kind of annoying issue because I can't honor players, chat, report, etc.

Ports are all forwarded. I've tried the hextech repair tool. Firewall bypass is setup. Internet connection is fine all game, chat works all game.

replies.body:
If your connection is dropping out enough to prevent you accessing the post-game lobby, then there are likely some issues between your PC and our servers. Since it sounds like you've already run through all the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), we'll need to look at your network route to figure out where this issue is coming from. I'd like you to run a traceroute with [**WinMTR**](http://winmtr.net/) in order to accomplish this. After loading up the app, simply plug **104.160.131.1** into the host field and run the trace for 5 minutes. After you've finished the trace, you can export the results as text and paste them in a reply.

Let me know if you ran into any issues.

Your traceroute reveals that your connection to our servers is fairly unstable. Your latency is spiking to **287ms** inside your home network before spiking to a peak of **675ms** before reaching our servers. This is a clear indication that there are issues in your network routing prior to your connection hitting our servers. I strongly recommend reaching out to your ISP's tier 2 support team with this traceroute so they can assist you in resolving this.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Unfortunately, I don't think that will do me much good. My ISP has a monopoly in my town, so providing awful support is par for the course. 

I found it odd that my in game latency is typically 50-ish (sans peak usage hours), but have so much trouble within the client.
